title: Playdate Unboxing and First Impressions

transcript_chunks.text: yo what's up my name is blessing eddie jr and i am here with a really cool unboxing of the playdate from panic if you somehow missed out on what this thing is it's a really cool little handheld device uh it's quirky it's unique it's fun basically it's kind of like a small little gameboy that that fits in your pocket but the twist is that it has a little crank on the side the idea of it is that developers are going to develop specifically for this thing and they have seasons of games that will come out and so every week they'll have like two games each of the games will take some kind of really unique functionality of the crank in there and so it's like a fun development challenge for developers and then for players you get to play fun little cool looking indie games which if you know me you know i like weirdness you know i like weird games you know like indie games and stuff i've been very excited about this thing uh taking a look at the box right on the back of the box they have this

know i like weirdness you know i like weird games you know like indie games and stuff i've been very excited about this thing uh taking a look at the box right on the back of the box they have this fun little write up where they write we made play date just for fun this little handheld game system fits perfectly in a pocket the screen is black and white the buttons feel great and the flip out crank yes gives games a whole new spin but the best part playdate has a whole world of original gaming surprises waiting to be delivered directly to you so let's have some fun i'm ready to have some fun i'm going to open this thing i'm already a fan of the packaging because it's very small uh there's a lot of accessories you can get with this thing i assume in here is just going to be the play date this is a review unit big shout out to panic for sending a review unit so let's take this thing out oh my god and take a look at that i'm a big sucker for really good packaging and the playdate right
